name: 100+ Whiteboard Design Templates by Steven Fang [Community]
description:
🏆 Nominate this file for the Figma Community Awards 2022👆


🎨 About this FigJam design templates file


📎 What: Over 100+ whiteboard design templates all personally designed by me across 5 topics:

  1. Brainstorm & Ideate
  2. User Research & Mapping
  3. Business, Marketing & Strategies
  4. Meetings & Workshops
  5. Icebreaker & other


📍 Instruction 

  1. Find the design template you’re looking for quickly via the following Notion directory database: https://stevenfang.notion.site/FigJam-design-templates-directory-by-Steven-Fang-04c12d6f304341f083f1386aea5694a8
  2. To quickly get to the specific design template within the FigJam file that I have shared, use a FigJam plugin called “Find and Replace”.
  3. That’s it, enjoy! 🌈


✅ Who is this for:

  • Students, professionals, freelancers, and entrepreneurs across different fields, industries and professions.


❌ Who is this not for:

  • This file is definitely not suitable for people who are not interested in getting over 100+ design templates for free.


📚 Future update plan

  1. Instruction and guide how to use each template
  2. More templates to be added for the existing topics
  3. More templates to be added for new topics


💎 How you can support me 

  1. 🎉 Nominate me for the 2022 #FigmaCommunityAwards by simply hitting the "Nominate" Button.
  2. 🚀 Follow me on social media (I’m just starting out, more content coming soon!) @stevenfang_
  3. 💚 Buy me a coffee: If you found my free design templates file useful to you, kindly consider buying me a few cups of coffee. Even just one cup of coffee would go a long way! ☕@stevenfang
